**Taylor Swift: A Data Story (not a love story)**

Taylor Swift has largely been a very successful artist, even in the modern day. In August 2023, Taylor Swift was the first female artist to reach 100 million monthly listeners. In fact, Swift has a \$740 million net worth as of June 2023 (according to Forbes).

What makes her music so popular? Analysing the statistics of Swift's music will help other musicians to figure out the ingredients in her music to cook up hits just like her. Maybe even you, following her recipe, will be able to catapult yourself to stardom!
